name: PDFActionResetForm
desc: PDFActionResetForm, a subclass of PDFAction, defines methods for getting and clearing fields in a PDF form.

items.name: var fields: [String]?
items.desc: Returns an array of fields associated with the reset action.

items.name: var fieldsIncludedAreCleared: Bool
items.desc: Sets whether the fields associated with the reset action are cleared when the action is performed.
